site.title: SLIT.IO - Fast & Secure Online Tools
site.description: Your collection of SLITities that run directly in your browser. Fast, secure, and private.

remover-fundo.title: Online Background Remover Free
remover-fundo.description: Remove the background from images with a single click, using AI. Free online tool to remove photo backgrounds quickly without losing quality.

descompactar-arquivo.title: Online ZIP File Decompressor
descompactar-arquivo.description: Extract files from a .zip archive directly in the browser. Unzip files online securely and for free, no software installation required.

comprimir-imagem.title: Free Online Image Compressor
comprimir-imagem.description: Reduce the size of your JPG, PNG, and WEBP images without losing quality. Compress images online for free for web use.

criptografar-arquivo.title: Online AES File Encryption
criptografar-arquivo.description: Encrypt and decrypt files using the AES algorithm. Secure online tool to protect your files with a password.

gerador-hash.title: Online SHA-256 Hash Generator
gerador-hash.description: Generate SHA-256 hashes for any text or file. Check file integrity online for free.

comprimir-arquivo.title: Online ZIP File Compressor
comprimir-arquivo.description: Create ZIP archives from multiple files easily. Compress files online for free in the browser.

contador-palavras.title: Free Online Word Counter
contador-palavras.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in a text. Fast and free online text analysis tool.

conversor-arquivos.title: Online File Converter
conversor-arquivos.description: Convert files from one format to another. Starting with images. Free online file conversion tool.

redimensionar-imagem.title: Online Image Resizer
redimensionar-imagem.description: Change the dimensions (width and height) of an image. Resize photos online for free without losing quality.
